name: Smartwool Merino 250 Baselayer 1/4 Zip Long Sleeve Top - Men's
categories: Merino 250 Baselayer 1/4 Zip Long Sleeve Top
description: Merino is standard issue for next to skin insulation. It works with your body's own heating and cooling system to keep your core temperature where you want it. This heavyweight top is a wonderful base layer in very cold weather, or goes solo on cool day. Perfect for ski touring, mountaineering and backpacking adventures and for high output snowshoeing and nordic skiing.Made of interlock knit merino wool, a fiber that wicks fast to keep you dry, and is naturally antimicrobial.Flatlock seams eliminate chafing.Shoulder panels move top shoulder seams for comfort with a pack25cm front zip with a semi-locking slider.
